title: Tim and Eric to Kick Off 2020 With a ‘Mandatory Attendance’ World Tour
text:
Tim and Eric. Photo: Tim and Eric/YouTube

Tim Heidecker and Eric Wareheim have some big plans in store for next year that may have them visiting a city near you. Today the comedy duo announced the “Tim and Eric 2020 Mandatory Attendance Tour,” which begins in Sydney, Australia, in mid-January and wraps up its run in Los Angeles in the beginning of March. According to the press release, the tour is “filled with brand new spoofs, goofs and insanity, and some very special surprises we can’t talk about right now. The experience is MANDATORY.” Be warned that watching the below announcement video automatically locks you into attending: “It’s legally binding!”

Tickets for the tour go on sale at Tim and Eric’s website this Friday, September 27, at 10 a.m. local time. Here are all of the tour dates announced today:

Wed. Jan. 15 - Sydney, AU @ Enmore Theatre Thu. Jan. 16 - Brisbane, AU @ The Tivoli Sat. Jan. 18 - Perth, AU @ Astor Theatre Mon. Jan. 20 - Adelaide, AU @ The Gov Tue. Jan. 21 - Melbourne, AU @ Hamer Hall Mon. Jan. 27 - San Diego, CA @ Balboa Theatre Tue. Jan. 28 - Phoenix, AZ @ Orpheum Theatre Thu. Jan. 30 - Dallas, TX @ Majestic Theatre Fri. Jan. 31 - Austin, TX @ ACL Live at the Moody Theater Sat. Feb. 1 - Houston, TX @ Cullen Performance Hall Mon. Feb. 3 - New Orleans, LA @ The Joy Theater Tue. Feb. 4 - Atlanta, GA @ Tabernacle Wed. Feb. 5 - Nashville, TN @ War Memorial Auditorium Fri. Feb. 7 - Durham, NC @ Carolina Theatre Sat. Feb. 8 - Washington, DC @ Lincoln Theatre Mon. Feb. 10 - Philadelphia, PA @ The Met Philadelphia Tue. Feb. 11 - Brooklyn, NY @ Kings Theatre Thu. Feb. 13 - Boston, MA @ Orpheum Theatre Fri. Feb. 14 - Albany, NY @ The Egg Sat. Feb. 15 - Toronto, ON @ Danforth Music Hall Mon. Feb. 17 - Pittsburgh, PA @ Carnegie Music Hall of Oakland Tue. Feb. 18 - Cleveland, OH @ Agora Theatre Wed. Feb. 19 - Detroit, MI @ The Masonic - Jack White Theater Thu. Feb. 20 - Indianapolis, IN @ Clowes Memorial Hall Fri. Feb. 21 - Columbus, OH @ Express Live Sat. Feb. 22 - Chicago, IL @ Chicago Theatre Sun. Feb. 23 - Madison, WI @ Orpheum Theater Tue. Feb. 25 - Minneapolis, MN @ State Theater Fri. Feb. 28 - Seattle, WA @ Moore Theatre Sat. Feb. 29 - Vancouver, BC @ Vogue Theatre Mon. March 2 - Portland, OR @ Arlene Schnitzer Concert Hall Wed. March 4 - San Francisco, CA @ The Warfield Fri. March 6 - Los Angeles, CA @ Theatre at Ace Hotel Sat. March 7 - Los Angeles, CA @ Theatre at Ace Hotel
description: Tim Heidecker and Eric Wareheim announced the ‘Tim and Eric 2020 Mandatory Attendance Tour’ today, which runs from mid-January through early March of next year and includes stops in Australia, Canada, and the U.S.
